files.patch:
@@ -1207,0 +1207,3 @@
+      // The other thread can block for safepoints during event callbacks, so ensure we
+      // are safepoint-safe while waiting.
+      ThreadBlockInVM tbivm(JavaThread::current());
@@ -1208,1 +1211,0 @@
-      // If another thread is posting events, let it finish
